message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents the value I place on it, I understand your budget constraints. Could you meet me at $17,000?  I'm confident you'll see a significant return on this investment.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
